tool_description: Configures response collection settings including data validation rules, required fields, response limits, and formatting options for different question types.

question_types.description: Types of questions requiring response configuration

validation_rules.description: Validation rules to apply (required, numeric_range, text_length, email_format, etc.)

response_limits.description: Response limits for open-ended questions (character limits, word counts)

mandatory_fields.description: Fields that must be completed before submission

data_formats.description: Expected data formats for responses (text, number, date, email, phone)

allow_partial_responses.description: Whether to allow saving partial/incomplete responses

response_anonymity.description: Response collection mode: anonymous, identified, or optional_identification

error_messages: Invalid question types: Use recognized question type identifiers.
Invalid validation rules: Use supported validation rule formats.
Response limits error: Response limits must be positive integers.
Invalid data formats: Use supported data format types [text, number, date, email, phone].
Invalid response anonymity: Use one of [anonymous, identified, optional_identification].
Mandatory fields error: mandatory_fields must reference valid question identifiers.
usage: Provide question_types, validation_rules, response_limits, mandatory_fields, and data_formats. Optionally set allow_partial_responses and response_anonymity. The tool configures comprehensive response collection settings.

configuration_summary.description: Summary of the response format configuration

estimated_completion_rate.description: Estimated completion rate percentage based on configuration
